                  def authenticate_test_user
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    # Accept explicit test user header first
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              14
            

            

                    test_user_id = request.headers['X-Test-User-Id'] || request.headers['X-Test-User-ID']
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              14
            

            

                    if test_user_id.present?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      @current_user = User.find_by(id: test_user_id)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      return head :unauthorized unless @current_user
          
      30.

      31.

      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    end
          
      33.

                    # Fallback to Authorization: Bearer <token> even in test

    35. 
            
              14
            

            

                    authorized = authenticate_with_http_token do |token, _options|
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
              13
            

            

                      @current_user = User.find_by(api_token: token)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              14

                      errors: message.errors.full_messages
          
      36.

              1
            

            

                def resolve(conversation_id:)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  conversation = Conversation.find(conversation_id)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  AnalyzeConversationJob.perform_later(conversation.id)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  {
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    success: true,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    message: "会話ID #{conversation.id} の分析をトリガーしました"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  {
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  }
          
      26.

              def perform(conversation_id)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
              20
            

            

                conversation = Conversation.find(conversation_id)

    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # 会話履歴を構築
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              20

      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              20
            

            

                return if conversation_history.empty?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19.

                # Claude APIで分析

                analysis_result = service.analyze_conversation(

    22. 
            

            

                  conversation_history,
          
      23.

      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

              private

              def build_conversation_history(conversation)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              20
            

            

                conversation.messages.order(:created_at).map do |message|
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              50
            

            

                    role: message.role,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    content: message.content,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    created_at: message.created_at
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              1
            

            

              def save_analysis(conversation, analysis_result)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              17
            

            

                analysis = conversation.analyses.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  analysis_type: 'needs'
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                )

              def calculate_average_confidence(analysis_result)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
              19
            

            

                needs = analysis_result['hidden_needs'] || []
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              19
            

            

                return 0.0 if needs.empty?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              16
            

            

                total_confidence = needs.sum { |need| need['confidence'].to_f }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              7
            

            

                total_confidence / needs.size
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95.

                analysis_result['escalation_required'] ||

                  analysis_result['customer_sentiment'] == FRUSTRATED_SENTIMENT
          
      100.

              def handle_escalation(conversation, analysis)

              def build_slack_message(conversation, analysis)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              1
            

            

                hidden_needs = analysis.hidden_needs || []
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
              1
            

            

                needs = hidden_needs.first(3).map do |n|
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
              1
            

            

                  next unless n.is_a?(Hash)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138.

      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              1

              def build_escalation_summary(analysis)

      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              5
            

            

                  next unless n.is_a?(Hash)

      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162.

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    1 relevant lines. 1 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
              1
            

            

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            end
          
      8.

    app/jobs/bot_response_job.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    40 relevant lines. 40 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            # ボット応答を非同期で処理するジョブ
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

            class BotResponseJob < ApplicationJob
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              queue_as :high_priority
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # リトライ設定
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: 5.seconds, attempts: 3
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              1
            

            

              def perform(conversation_id:, user_message_id:)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              9
            

            

                conversation, user_message = load_records(conversation_id, user_message_id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              7
            

            

                return unless valid_user_message?(user_message, conversation_id)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              5
            

            

                bot_response = generate_bot_response(conversation, user_message)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
              5
            

            

                handle_response(conversation, user_message, bot_response)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              2
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Record not found: #{e.message}"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              1
            

            

              def load_records(conversation_id, user_message_id)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
              9
            

            

                [Conversation.find(conversation_id), Message.find(user_message_id)]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              1
            

            

              def valid_user_message?(user_message, conversation_id)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              7
            

            

                user_message.role == 'user' && user_message.conversation_id == conversation_id
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
              1
            

            

              def generate_bot_response(conversation, user_message)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              5
            

            

                ChatBotService.new(
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  conversation: conversation,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  user_message: user_message
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                ).generate_response
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_response(conversation, user_message, bot_response)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              5
            

            

                if bot_response.nil?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              2
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to generate bot response for message #{user_message.id}"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              2
            

            

                  handle_error(conversation, user_message)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
              3
            

            

                  broadcast_bot_message(conversation, bot_response)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              3
            

            

                  after_response_generated(conversation, bot_response)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45.

              def handle_error(conversation, user_message)

                conversation.with_lock do

    52. 
            
              2
            

            

                  relation = conversation.messages
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                                         .where(role: 'assistant')
          
      54.

                                         .where('metadata @> ?', { error: true, original_message_id: user_message.id }.to_json)

              2
            

            

                  error_message ||= conversation.messages.create!(
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

            class HybridAnalysisJob < ApplicationJob
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              queue_as :default

      7.

              1
            

            

              def perform(conversation_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              11
            

            

                conversation = Conversation.find(conversation_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # 会話履歴を構築
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              11
            

            

                conversation_history = build_conversation_history(conversation)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # NeedsExtractorで分析
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              11
            

            

                extractor = NeedsExtractor.new
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
              11
            

            

                extracted_needs = extractor.extract_needs(conversation_history)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # 分析結果を保存
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              9
            

            

                analysis = save_analysis(conversation, extracted_needs)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # リアルタイム配信
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              9
            

            

                broadcast_analysis_result(conversation, analysis)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # 高優先度の場合はエスカレーション
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
              9
            

            

                handle_escalation(conversation, analysis) if requires_escalation?(extracted_needs)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              9
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Analysis completed for conversation ##{conversation.id}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              2
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Analysis failed for conversation ##{conversation.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      29.

              def build_conversation_history(conversation)

              def save_analysis(conversation, extracted_needs)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # 既存の分析を更新または新規作成
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              9
            

            

                analysis = conversation.analyses.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  analysis_type: 'needs'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                )
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                
          
      53.

                # 分析データを構築

      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56.

                )

                analysis

              def build_analysis_data(extracted_needs)

                {

              def determine_overall_priority(extracted_needs)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
              11
            

            

                return 'low' if extracted_needs.empty?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              28
            

            

                priorities = extracted_needs.map { |n| n[:priority] }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
              9
            

            

                if priorities.include?('high')
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              9
            

            

                  'high'
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                elsif priorities.include?('medium')
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  'medium'
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  'low'

              end

              def determine_overall_sentiment(extracted_needs)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                # 感情ブーストがあるニーズをチェック
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
              31
            

            

                boosted_needs = extracted_needs.select { |n| n[:priority_boost].to_i.positive? }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
              20
            

            

                if boosted_needs.any? { |n| n[:priority_boost].to_i >= 2 }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
              9
            

            

                  'frustrated'
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
              2
            

            

                elsif boosted_needs.any?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  'negative'
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                else
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              2
            

            

                  'neutral'
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_average_confidence(extracted_needs)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              11
            

            

                return 0.0 if extracted_needs.empty?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
              28
            

            

                total_confidence = extracted_needs.sum { |n| n[:confidence] }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              9
            

            

                (total_confidence / extracted_needs.length).round(2)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
              1
            

            

              def broadcast_analysis_result(conversation, analysis)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
              9
            

            

                ActionCable.server.broadcast(
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126.

              def requires_escalation?(extracted_needs)

              def handle_escalation(conversation, analysis)

                analysis.escalate!

      148.

              def build_slack_message(conversation, analysis)

                <<~MESSAGE
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  🚨 エスカレーションが必要な会話を検出
          
      178.

              def perform(conversation_id:, messages_data:)

    8. 
            

            

                conversation = Conversation.find(conversation_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                service = MessageBatchService.new(
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  conversation: conversation,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12.

      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                )
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

              def after_batch_save(conversation)

              def should_analyze?(conversation)

                ActionCable.server.broadcast(

              def generate_ai_response(message)

              def expire_redis_caches
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                redis = Rails.cache.redis
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                pattern = "#{CacheableMessage::CACHE_KEY_PREFIX}/conversation/#{conversation_id}/*"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                # LuaスクリプトでRedisキーを効率的に削除
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                lua_script = <<~LUA
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  local keys = redis.call('keys', ARGV[1])
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  for i=1,#keys,5000 do
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    redis.call('del', unpack(keys, i, math.min(i+4999, #keys)))
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  return #keys
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                LUA
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                redis.eval(lua_script, [], [pattern])
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to expire Redis cache: #{e.message}"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            end
          
      118.

              def calculate_confidence_score(sentiment_result, needs_result)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              13
            

            

                scores = []
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                # 感情分析の信頼度
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
              13
            

            

                if sentiment_result[:sentiment_history].present?
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
              43
            

            

                  sentiment_scores = sentiment_result[:sentiment_history].filter_map { |h| h.dig(:sentiment, :confidence) }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
              13
            

            

                  scores << (sentiment_scores.sum.to_f / sentiment_scores.size) if sentiment_scores.any?
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                # 隠れたニーズ抽出の信頼度
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
              13
            

            

                scores << needs_result[:confidence_score] if needs_result[:confidence_score].present?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              13
            

            

                return 0.0 if scores.empty?
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                # 平均信頼度を計算
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
              13
            

            

                (scores.sum.to_f / scores.size).round(2)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112.

    113.

                  temperature: 0.7,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  system: chatbot_system_prompt,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  messages: messages
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                )
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49.

              def system_prompt
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              15
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  あなたはBtoB SaaSのカスタマーサクセスAIアシスタントです。
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  顧客との会話を分析し、隠れたニーズや課題を発見して、プロアクティブな提案を行います。
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70.

      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    "hidden_needs": [
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      {
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        "need_type": "効率化|自動化|コスト削減|機能改善|その他",
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        "evidence": "会話からの具体的な証拠",

    76. 
            

            

                        "confidence": 0.0-1.0の数値,

              def chatbot_system_prompt
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
              2
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  あなたはBtoB SaaSのカスタマーサポートボットです。
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  親切で専門的な対応を心がけ、顧客の問題解決を支援します。
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  以下のガイドラインに従ってください：
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  1. 簡潔で分かりやすい回答を心がける
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  2. 技術的な内容も噛み砕いて説明する
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  3. 必要に応じて具体例を提示する
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  4. 解決できない場合は、人間のサポート担当者への引き継ぎを提案する
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  5. 顧客の感情に配慮した返答をする
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                PROMPT
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
              1
            

            

              def build_analysis_prompt(conversation_history, user_query)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              15
            

            

                <<~PROMPT
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  以下の会話履歴を分析し、顧客の隠れたニーズと推奨アクションを特定してください。

              def build_conversation_messages(conversation_history, user_message)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
              2
            

            

                messages = []
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                # 会話履歴を追加（最新の10件まで）
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
              2
            

            

                recent_history = conversation_history.last(10)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              2
            

            

                recent_history.each do |msg|
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              6
            

            

                  role = msg[:role] == 'user' ? 'user' : 'assistant'
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
              6
            

            

                  messages << { role: role, content: msg[:content] }
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                # 最新のユーザーメッセージを追加
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
              2
            

            

                messages << { role: 'user', content: user_message }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
              2
            

            

                messages
          
      130.

              def format_conversation(conversation_history)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              16
            

            

                conversation_history.map do |msg|
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              41
            

            

                  "#{msg[:role] == 'user' ? 'ユーザー' : 'サポート'}: #{msg[:content]}"
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                end.join("\n")
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138.

              1
            

            

              def parse_analysis_response(response)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              17
            

            

                content = extract_text_content(response)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                # JSONブロックを抽出（```json ... ``` または直接のJSON）
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              17
            

            

                json_match = content.match(/```json\s*(.*?)\s*```/m) || content.match(/\{.*\}/m)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              17
            

            

                if json_match
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
              4
            

            

                  JSON.parse(json_match[1] || json_match[0])
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                else
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  # JSONが見つからない場合のフォールバック
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              13
            

            

                  default_analysis_result
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "JSON Parse Error: #{e.message}"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                default_analysis_result
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155.

              def extract_text_content(response)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              18
            

            

                if response.is_a?(Hash) && response['content']
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              7
            

            

                  Array(response['content']).map do |content_item|
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              7
            

            

                    content_item['text'] if content_item['type'] == 'text'
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  end.compact.join("\n")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                else
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              11
            

            

                  response.to_s
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            

              def default_analysis_result
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              13

                  text: text,

                  channel: channel,
          
      20.

                post_json?(webhook_url, payload)

              def self.build_notification_text(conversation, analysis)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                <<~TEXT
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  ⚠️ **エスカレーションが必要な会話**

      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99.

      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101.

      102.

              def self.post_json?(webhook_url, payload)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                uri = URI.parse(webhook_url)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                http.use_ssl = (uri.scheme == 'https')
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                request.body = payload.to_json
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                response = http.request(request)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                raise NotificationError, "Notification failed: #{response.body}" unless response.code == '200'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                true
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              1
            

            

              private_class_method :post_json?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            end

              INTENT_KEYWORDS = {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

                greeting: %w[こんにちは おはよう こんばんは はじめまして よろしく],
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                question: %w[？ ? 教えて どうやって なぜ どうして いつ どこ 何],
          
      11.

                complaint: %w[困っ エラー 動かない おかしい 不具合 バグ 失敗 できない],
          
      12.

              def initialize(message:)

              # 意図を認識

              def recognize

              # 意図の詳細分析

              def analyze_sentiment
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
              3
            

            

                positive_words = %w[嬉しい 良い 素晴らしい 最高 便利 助かる]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              3
            

            

                negative_words = %w[悪い 最悪 ひどい 困る 不満 イライラ]
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              3
            

            

                positive_score = count_word_matches(positive_words)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              3
            

            

                negative_score = count_word_matches(negative_words)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              3
            

            

                if positive_score > negative_score
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              1
            

            

                  'positive'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              2
            

            

                elsif negative_score > positive_score
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              1
            

            

                  'negative'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              1
            

            

                  'neutral'
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              # 意図を検出
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              1
            

            

              def detect_intents
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
              37
            

            

                intents = []
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              37
            

            

                INTENT_KEYWORDS.each do |intent_type, keywords|
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
              222
            

            

                  matched_keywords = find_matching_keywords(keywords)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              222
            

            

                  next if matched_keywords.empty?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              19
            

            

                  confidence = calculate_confidence(intent_type, matched_keywords, keywords)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              19
            

            

                  intents << {
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    type: intent_type,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    confidence: confidence,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    keywords: matched_keywords
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  }
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81.

                intents
          
      83.

      84.

              # マッチするキーワードを検索
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
              1
            

            

              def find_matching_keywords(keywords)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
              1591
            

            

                keywords.select { |keyword| @message.include?(keyword) }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              # 信頼度を計算
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_confidence(intent_type, matched_keywords, all_keywords)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # マッチした単語数の割合をベースとする
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              19
            

            

                base_confidence = matched_keywords.size.to_f / [all_keywords.size, 5].min
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                # メッセージ長による調整（短いメッセージは調整を小さく）
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              19
            

            

                length_factor = [@message.length / 50.0, 0.5].min
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                # 複数マッチによるボーナス
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
              19
            

            

                multi_match_bonus = matched_keywords.size > 1 ? 0.3 : 0.1
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
              19
            

            

                score = ((base_confidence * 0.7) + (length_factor * 0.2) + multi_match_bonus)

                efficiency: {

              def initialize

              # 会話履歴から隠れたニーズを抽出

              1
            

            

              def extract_needs(conversation_history)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
              21
            

            

                @detected_needs = []
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              21
            

            

                @context_buffer = []
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # 会話履歴を順番に分析
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              21
            

            

                conversation_history.each_with_index do |message, index|
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
              62
            

            

                  next unless message[:role] == 'user'
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              40
            

            

                  content = message[:content]
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
              40
            

            

                  @context_buffer << content
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

                  # パターンマッチングによるニーズ検出

              40
            

            

                  detect_needs_by_pattern(content, index)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102.

                  # コンテキスト分析（前後のメッセージを考慮）
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              40
            

            

                  analyze_context(conversation_history, index) if index > 0
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105.

              private

              def detect_needs_by_pattern(content, message_index)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              40
            

            

                NEED_PATTERNS.each do |need_type, config|
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # キーワードマッチング
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
              240
            

            

                  keyword_score = calculate_keyword_score(content, config[:keywords])
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # パターンマッチング
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              240
            

            

                  config[:patterns].each do |pattern|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
              720
            

            

                    next unless content.match?(pattern)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              42
            

            

                    match_data = content.match(pattern)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              42
            

            

                    context = extract_context_from_match(match_data)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
              42
            

            

                    @detected_needs << {
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      type: need_type,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      evidence: content,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      context: context,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      confidence: calculate_confidence(keyword_score, pattern),
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      message_index: message_index,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      suggestion: generate_suggestion(need_type, context)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                end
          
      134.

              end
          
      135.

      136.
