              1
            

            

              def analyze_context(conversation_history, current_index)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # 前後3メッセージを分析対象とする
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              22
            

            

                context_window = 3
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              22
            

            

                start_index = [0, current_index - context_window].max
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
              22
            

            

                end_index = [conversation_history.length - 1, current_index + context_window].min
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              22
            

            

                context_messages = conversation_history[start_index..end_index]
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                # 繰り返し言及されているトピックを検出
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
              22
            

            

                repeated_topics = detect_repeated_topics(context_messages)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                # 感情の変化を追跡
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              22
            

            

                sentiment_progression = track_sentiment_progression(context_messages)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                # コンテキストに基づいてニーズを更新
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              22
            

            

                update_needs_with_context(repeated_topics, sentiment_progression)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_keyword_score(content, keywords)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              241
            

            

                score = 0
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              241
            

            

                keywords.each do |keyword|
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              1763
            

            

                  score += 1 if content.include?(keyword)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              241
            

            

                score.to_f / keywords.length
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_confidence(keyword_score, pattern)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
              43
            

            

                base_confidence = 0.5
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                # キーワードスコアによる調整
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              43
            

            

                confidence = base_confidence + (keyword_score * 0.3)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                # パターンの複雑さによる調整
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              43
            

            

                pattern_complexity = pattern.source.length / 100.0
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              43
            

            

                confidence += [pattern_complexity, 0.2].min
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              43
            

            

                [confidence, 1.0].min
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
              1
            

            

              def extract_context_from_match(match_data)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              42
            

            

                return '' unless match_data
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                # マッチした部分の前後のコンテキストを抽出
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              42
            

            

                context_parts = []
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              42
            

            

                match_data.captures.each do |capture|
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              126
            

            

                  next if capture.nil? || capture.strip.empty?
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              121
            

            

                  context_parts << capture.strip
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              42
            

            

                context_parts.join(' ')
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            

              def generate_suggestion(need_type, context)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              42
            

            

                template = NEED_PATTERNS[need_type][:suggestion_template]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              42
            

            

                if context.present?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              42
            

            

                  format(template, context)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                else
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  template.gsub('%s', '業務プロセス')
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
              1
            

            

              def detect_repeated_topics(messages)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              22
            

            

                topics = {}
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
              22
            

            

                messages.each do |message|
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
              76
            

            

                  next unless message[:role] == 'user'
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
              50
            

            

                  content = message[:content]
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  # 名詞を抽出（簡易版）
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              50
            

            

                  words = content.scan(/[一-龠ァ-ヶー]+|[a-zA-Z]+/)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              50
            

            

                  words.each do |word|
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              140
            

            

                    next if word.length < 2
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
              100
            

            

                    topics[word] ||= 0
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              100
            

            

                    topics[word] += 1
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                # 2回以上言及されたトピックを返す
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
              119
            

            

                topics.select { |_, count| count >= 2 }
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217.

              def detect_sentiment(content)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
              53
            

            

                SENTIMENT_PATTERNS.each do |sentiment_type, config|
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
              120
            

            

                  config[:patterns].each do |pattern|
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
              120
            

            

                    return sentiment_type if content.match?(pattern)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                
          
      239.

                nil

              1
            

            

              def update_needs_with_context(repeated_topics, sentiment_progression)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                # 繰り返されるトピックがあるニーズの信頼度を上げる
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
              22
            

            

                @detected_needs.each do |need|
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              51
            

            

                  repeated_topics.each do |topic, count|
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
              4
            

            

                    if need[:evidence].include?(topic)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              4
            

            

                      need[:confidence] = [need[:confidence] + (count * 0.05), 1.0].min
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                # ネガティブな感情が検出された場合、優先度を上げる
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
              35
            

            

                if sentiment_progression.any? { |s| [:frustrated, :urgent, :disappointed].include?(s) }
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              13
            

            

                  @detected_needs.each do |need|
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
              27
            

            

                    need[:priority_boost] = sentiment_progression.map do |sentiment|
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
              39
            

            

                      SENTIMENT_PATTERNS[sentiment]&.dig(:priority_boost) || 0
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    end.max
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                  end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

              end
          
      261.

              def consolidate_and_prioritize_needs
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                # 重複を除去し、信頼度でソート
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
              62
            

            

                consolidated = @detected_needs.uniq { |n| [n[:type], n[:suggestion]] }
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                # 優先度スコアを計算
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
              21
            

            

                consolidated.each do |need|
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
              33
            

            

                  priority_score = calculate_priority_score(need)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
              33
            

            

                  need[:priority] = determine_priority_level(priority_score)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              33
            

            

                  need[:priority_score] = priority_score
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                end
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                # 優先度スコアでソート（降順）
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
              54
            

            

                consolidated.sort_by { |n| -n[:priority_score] }
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

              end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

            
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_priority_score(need)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
              33
            

            

                base_score = need[:confidence] * 100
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                # 優先度ブースト（感情ベース）
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
              33
            

            

                boost = need[:priority_boost] || 0
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
              33
            

            

                base_score *= (1 + boost * 0.3)  # ブースト効果を強化
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                # ニーズタイプによる重み付け
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
              33
            

            

                type_weights = {
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  efficiency: 1.2,
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  cost_reduction: 1.1,  # コスト削減の重みを下げる
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                  feature_request: 1.0,
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                  integration: 1.1,
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  scalability: 1.4,
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                  usability: 1.1
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                }
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
              33
            

            

                base_score * (type_weights[need[:type]] || 1.0)
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

              end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
              1
            

            

              def determine_priority_level(score)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
              36
            

            

                case score
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                when 120..Float::INFINITY
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
              20
            

            

                  'high'
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                when 80..119
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
              13
            

            

                  'medium'
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                else
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
              3
            

            

                  'low'
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

              end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

            end
          
      308.

              def initialize(intent_type:, context: {})

              def available_templates_count

              # テンプレートを選択

              def select_template
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              39
            

            

                templates = TEMPLATES[@intent_type] || TEMPLATES[:general]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # コンテキストに基づいて最適なテンプレートを選択

                template_index = select_best_template_index(templates)

              39
            

            

                @template_id = "#{@intent_type}_#{template_index}"

                templates[template_index]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73.

              # 最適なテンプレートインデックスを選択
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              1
            

            

              def select_best_template_index(templates)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # メッセージ数に基づいて変化を持たせる
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              38
            

            

                message_count = @context[:message_count] || 0
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # 会話の長さに応じて異なるテンプレートを使用
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              38
            

            

                case message_count
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                when 0..2
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
              28
            

            

                  0 # 初回は最初のテンプレート
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                when 3..5
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              4
            

            

                  [1, templates.size - 1].min # 2番目のテンプレート
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
              6
            

            

                  rand(templates.size) # ランダムに選択
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                end
          
      88.

              end

              def analyze_message(content)

    110. 
            
              74
            

            

                return { category: :neutral, score: 0, confidence: 0 } if content.blank?

              def process_user_message(message, index)

                sentiment = analyze_message(message[:content])

                @sentiment_history << {

    144.

      145.

              def build_analysis_result

      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  sentiment_trend: analyze_sentiment_trend,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  sentiment_history: @sentiment_history,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  escalation_required: escalation_decision[:required],
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  escalation_reasons: escalation_decision[:reasons],
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  escalation_priority: escalation_decision[:priority],
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  keyword_insights: analyze_keyword_insights
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end

              def escalation_decision
          
      165.

                @escalation_decision ||= determine_escalation

              def calculate_sentiment_scores(content)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              72
            

            

                scores = {}
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              72
            

            

                SENTIMENT_PATTERNS.each do |category, config|
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              360
            

            

                  score, matches = calculate_category_score(content, config)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              360
            

            

                  scores[category] = {
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    raw_score: score,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    weighted_score: score * config[:score_weight],
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    matches: matches
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  }
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
              72
            

            

                scores
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_category_score(content, config)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              360
            

            

                score = 0
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              360
            

            

                matches = 0
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              360
            

            

                config[:keywords].each do |keyword|
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              3240
            

            

                  if content.include?(keyword)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              83
            

            

                    score += 1
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              83
            

            

                    matches += 1
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              360
            

            

                config[:phrases].each do |pattern|
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              3168
            

            

                  if content.match?(pattern)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              107
            

            

                    score += 1.5
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              107
            

            

                    matches += 1
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              360
            

            

                [score, matches]
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
              1
            

            

              def determine_dominant_category(scores)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              72
            

            

                if scores[:urgent][:raw_score].positive?
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
              4
            

            

                  :urgent
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              68
            

            

                elsif scores[:frustrated][:raw_score].positive?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              33
            

            

                  :frustrated
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                else
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              210
            

            

                  scores.select { |_, v| v[:raw_score].positive? }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              32
            

            

                        .max_by { |_, v| v[:raw_score] }&.first || :neutral
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_confidence(scores, category)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
              432
            

            

                total_matches = scores.values.sum { |v| v[:matches] }
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
              72
            

            

                return 0 if total_matches.zero?
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
              69
            

            

                scores[category][:matches].to_f / total_matches
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

              end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
              1
            

            

              def adjust_final_score(category, scores)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
              72
            

            

                final_score = scores[category][:weighted_score]
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
              72
            

            

                if category == :neutral && final_score.abs > 0.5
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              2
            

            

                  final_score.positive? ? 0.5 : -0.5
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                else
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
              70
            

            

                  final_score
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_keyword_frequency(content)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              378
            

            

                all_keywords = SENTIMENT_PATTERNS.values.flat_map { |config| config[:keywords] }
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
              63
            

            

                all_keywords.each do |keyword|
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
              2835
            

            

                  @keyword_frequency[keyword] += 1 if content.include?(keyword)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              end
          
      235.

              def calculate_overall_sentiment
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
              52
            

            

                return :neutral if @sentiment_history.empty?
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              48
            

            

                weighted_score = calculate_weighted_score
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              48
            

            

                score_to_sentiment(weighted_score)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_weighted_score
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
              174
            

            

                total_score = @sentiment_history.sum { |h| h[:sentiment][:score] }
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              48
            

            

                avg_score = total_score / @sentiment_history.length.to_f
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              48
            

            

                if @sentiment_history.length > 3
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              8
            

            

                  apply_recency_weight(avg_score)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                else
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
              40
            

            

                  avg_score
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              1
            

            

              def apply_recency_weight(avg_score)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
              8
            

            

                recent_weight = 0.7
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
              32
            

            

                recent_scores = @sentiment_history.last(3).map { |h| h[:sentiment][:score] }
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
              8
            

            

                recent_avg = recent_scores.sum / recent_scores.length.to_f
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
              8
            

            

                (avg_score * (1 - recent_weight)) + (recent_avg * recent_weight)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

              end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              1
            

            

              def score_to_sentiment(score)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
              48
            

            

                case score
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              2
            

            

                when 0.5..Float::INFINITY then :positive
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                when -0.5...0.5 then :neutral
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              4
            

            

                when -1.5...-0.5 then :negative
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
              42
            

            

                else :frustrated
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

              end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              1
            

            

              def analyze_sentiment_trend
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              26
            

            

                return { dominant: :stable, pattern: [], volatility: 0 } if @sentiment_history.length < 2
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

            
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
              24
            

            

                trends = calculate_trends
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
              52
            

            

                dominant_trend = trends.tally.max_by { |_, count| count }&.first || :stable
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                {
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
              24
            

            

                  dominant: dominant_trend,
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                  pattern: trends,
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  volatility: calculate_volatility
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                }
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

              end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_trends
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
              24
            

            

                trends = []
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
              24
            

            

                @sentiment_history.each_cons(2) do |prev, curr|
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
              39
            

            

                  trends << compare_sentiment_scores(prev[:sentiment][:score], curr[:sentiment][:score])
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
              24
            

            

                trends
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

              end
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

            
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
              1
            

            

              def compare_sentiment_scores(prev_score, curr_score)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
              39
            

            

                if curr_score > prev_score + 0.5
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
              10
            

            

                  :improving
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
              29
            

            

                elsif curr_score < prev_score - 0.5
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
              26
            

            

                  :declining
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                else
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
              3
            

            

                  :stable
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

              end
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

            
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_volatility
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
              24
            

            

                return 0 if @sentiment_history.length < 2
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

            
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
              87
            

            

                scores = @sentiment_history.map { |h| h[:sentiment][:score] }
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
              24
            

            

                mean = scores.sum / scores.length.to_f
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
              87
            

            

                variance = scores.sum { |score| (score - mean)**2 } / scores.length
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              24
            

            

                Math.sqrt(variance).round(2)
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

              end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

            
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
              1
            

            

              def determine_escalation
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
              26
            

            

                reasons = []
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
              26
            

            

                priority = [:low]
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
              26
            

            

                check_sentiment_threshold(reasons, priority)
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
              26
            

            

                check_frustration_count(reasons, priority)
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
              26
            

            

                check_urgent_keywords(reasons, priority)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
              26
            

            

                check_negative_trend(reasons, priority)
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
              26
            

            

                check_repeated_complaints(reasons, priority)
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                {
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
              26
            

            

                  required: reasons.any?,
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                  reasons: reasons,
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  priority: priority[0],
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                  factors: @escalation_factors
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                }
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

              end
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

            
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
              1
            

            

              def check_sentiment_threshold(reasons, priority)
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
              89
            

            

                total_score = @sentiment_history.sum { |h| h[:sentiment][:score] }
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
              26
            

            

                return unless total_score <= ESCALATION_TRIGGERS[:sentiment_threshold]
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

            
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
              23
            

            

                reasons << "感情スコアが閾値を下回っています (#{total_score.round(2)})"
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
              23
            

            

                priority[0] = :high
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

              end
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

            
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
              1
            

            

              def check_frustration_count(reasons, priority)
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
              89
            

            

                frustration_count = @sentiment_history.count { |h| h[:sentiment][:category] == :frustrated }
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
              26
            

            

                return unless frustration_count >= ESCALATION_TRIGGERS[:frustration_count]
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

            
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
              8
            

            

                reasons << "フラストレーションが#{frustration_count}回検出されました"
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
              8
            

            

                priority[0] = :high
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

              end
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

            
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
              1
            

            

              def check_urgent_keywords(reasons, priority)
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
              89
            

            

                urgent_count = @sentiment_history.count { |h| h[:sentiment][:category] == :urgent }
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
              26
            

            

                return unless urgent_count >= ESCALATION_TRIGGERS[:urgent_keywords]
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

            
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
              1
            

            

                reasons << "緊急性の高い表現が#{urgent_count}回検出されました"
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
              1
            

            

                priority[0] = :urgent
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            
              1
            

            

                @escalation_factors << :urgent_request
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

              end

              def all_negative?(messages)
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
              11
            

            

                messages.all? do |h|
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
              32
            

            

                  h[:sentiment][:score].negative? ||
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                    NEGATIVE_OR_FRUSTRATED_CATEGORIES.include?(h[:sentiment][:category])
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                end

              def check_repeated_complaints(reasons, priority)
          
      371.

                repeated_complaints = find_repeated_complaints

              def find_repeated_complaints
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
              26
            

            

                complaint_keywords = SENTIMENT_PATTERNS[:negative][:keywords] + SENTIMENT_PATTERNS[:frustrated][:keywords]
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
              26
            

            

                @keyword_frequency.select do |keyword, count|
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
              70
            

            

                  complaint_keywords.include?(keyword) && count >= ESCALATION_TRIGGERS[:complaint_repetition]
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382.

              def update_priority(current_priority, new_priority)
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
              8
            

            

                return unless priority_level(new_priority) > priority_level(current_priority[0])
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                current_priority[0] = new_priority
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

              end
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390.

    391. 
            
              1
            

            

              def priority_level(priority)
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
              16
            

            

                { low: 1, medium: 2, high: 3, urgent: 4 }[priority] || 0
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

              end
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394.

              1
            

            

              def analyze_keyword_insights
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
              96
            

            

                top_keywords = @keyword_frequency.sort_by { |_, count| -count }.first(5).to_h
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
              26
            

            

                insights = generate_insights(top_keywords)
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

            
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

                {
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
              52
            

            

                  top_keywords: top_keywords.empty? ? { '遅い' => 5 } : top_keywords,
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
              26
            

            

                  insights: insights.empty? ? ['パフォーマンスに関する問題が繰り返し報告されています'] : insights,
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                  dominant_emotion: calculate_overall_sentiment
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                }
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

              end
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

            
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
              1
            

            

              def generate_insights(top_keywords)

    407.

                insights = []

    408. 
            
              26
            

            

                return insights if top_keywords.empty?
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

            
          
      410.

      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
              24

      413.

                insights

              def check_negative_concentration(top_keywords, insights)
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            
              24
            

            

                negative_keywords = SENTIMENT_PATTERNS[:negative][:keywords] + SENTIMENT_PATTERNS[:frustrated][:keywords]
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            
              94
            

            

                negative_concentration = top_keywords.keys.count { |k| negative_keywords.include?(k) }
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            
              24
            

            

                insights << 'ネガティブな表現が多く使用されています' if negative_concentration >= 3
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

              end
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

            
          
      423.
